verbose_text: The cause of the CPVT like phenotype in our patient may be a combination of this RyR2 variant and hypercalcemia, which would be expected to increase calcium loading to the cells and eventually to the sarcoplasmic reticulum resulting in store-overload-induced calcium release (SOICR) during physical and emotional stress.
evidence: RyR2 variant and hypercalcemia, which would be expected to increase calcium
